These shoes look great and they are comfy. My only issue is that there is nothing on the bottom to prevent you from slipping. They slide on everything from carpet to tile, even hardwood floors. I’ve nearly wiped out several times in them. They are cute, fit is okay. Nice quilted cushion interior. It’s the sole of the shoe that is lacking. The price isn’t bad for them either.

I can't believe that I've gone so much of my life without having velvet loafers.  I got my first pair a couple of months ago and now I get can't enough.  These are really great looking shoes.  One look at these shoes and people know that you're a man of refinement and sophistication.  You'll have to get used to everyone looking at your feet with envy and admiration.  When I took them out of the box the soles of these shoes were incredibly slick but I just wore them around the house for about an hour and that went away.  I wouldn't go hiking wearing these, but I'm no longer sliding over our hardwood floors like I'm wearing bowling shoes.Maybe the most surprising thing about these shoes is how comfortable they are.  When I wore them around the house to de-slickify them I kept them on all evening.  Now I put them on instead of slippers when I get home.  In fact, I'm wearing them as I sit at my desk and write this review.  Highly recommended!

These shoes have very smooth and slippery blue plastic layer at the bottom making them dangerous to walk in. I was trying to figure out why would anyone want slippery shoes, when one of my kids shouted: moonwalk!  The top is made of suede material, and the insides have a blue color with nice stitched diamond pattern. I am not a fan of the gold tiger print. Also the shoes have a pointy front making them larger than needed.  Because they are so slippery, I will not be able to use these shoes. If you are okay with that, they may work for you.

The packaging and quality of the shoe are much better than the pricing might indicate. The velvet feels nice, and the construction seems to be of a good quality. Not built for a wider foot, so please be aware of that. Otherwise, you can't go wrong with these.

Its decent for me. I find it well made and its looks like a slipper that you can wear around the house. The bottom of the shoes are really smooth and maybe that's the way they designed it. It's comfortable so its not all bad.

These Men's dress shoes fit very well. I got the ones that have a nice tiger design logo on the top center. The black material of the shoe feels like velvet or felt material. Very soft! The inside of the show is a nice blue knitted material and casing, also the bottom of the shoes are blue too.  These dress shoes go very nicely with a pair of slacks or even jeans. A nice stylish appearance overall.  My only concern is with the bottom of the shoes. They are very smooth and slippery. These shoes have no grip or traction so be careful. I wore them twice so far and slide around everywhere on any type of floor other than carpet. Just be mindful of that!

The Jousen Loafers for Men are a stunning pair of dress shoes that exude style, luxury, and sophistication. The velvet material and embroidery detailing make them stand out from other dress shoes, making them an excellent choice for special occasions, formal events, or when you want to add a touch of elegance to your outfit. They are designed with a cushioned insole that provides ample support and reduces fatigue during long hours of wear. The slip-on design also makes them easy to wear and take off, and the lightweight construction ensures that your feet won't feel weighed down. The embroidery detailing on these shoes is simply breathtaking. It adds a touch of opulence and uniqueness to the shoes, making them a standout piece in any outfit. The embroidery is also well done and doesn't feel cheap or tacky.They can be dressed up or down, making them suitable for various occasions, from weddings to formal dinners to holiday parties. They pair well with a suit or dress pants but can also be worn with jeans or chinos for a more casual look.

The shoes have the Tiger emblem and they sure are noticeable.  These are fun and unique and are a good pair of shoes to wear and show off your unique style. I cannot say everyone will gloat over these but if you like them then who cares right? Go for it.  Light and comfortable to boot (no pun intended).

I brought these nice suede shoes for my husband, for a party. We both loved them. Fits your correct size. He didn't wear socks, seems like that's what all guys are doing when wearing loafers to not have on socks unless needed. Also loved how it's red in the inside & on the bottom. Like Red bottoms. We would definitely buy again.
